description:
Sidney Sithole was a http://anidb.net/ch1535 [Free Planets Alliance] flag officer. He was known for his "parallel pursuit" tactic during the Fifth Battle of http://anidb.net/ch1762 [Iserlohn] and for his mentoring of http://anidb.net/ch737 [Yang Wenli].
Source: Gineipaedia
name: Sidney Sithole
